Membership Information
Celebrate the luxury South Florida lifestyle at Admirals Cove. The Club offers 5 levels of membership to suit the needs of all of our residents. Choices include the
Golf Membership
,
Sports Member
,
Tennis Member
,
Social Member
and
Marina Member
. Being a member of the resort-style community gives residents full access to luxurious amenities, convenient service and all the benefits of an award-winning country club.
Golf Membership
A Golf Membership allows members full use of all The Club’s facilities as well as 3 day sign up privilege for golf starting times and tennis court reservations – including the perks of no fee for golf or tennis, just $32 cart fee (per play) or an $1300 trail fee.
Sports Membership
A Sports Member will have a 3 day sign up privilege to reserve tennis courts – no fee and a 2 day sign up privilege for golf starting times. A Sports Member is restricted to the use of the golf course 4 times per month (with a maximum of 2 times on the East) – in season from November 1st to April 30th. Enjoy the benefits of unlimited golf play out of season from May 1st to October 31st. No green fees, just carts fees at the same rate as Golf Members.
Tennis Membership
A Tennis Member will be entitled to use of all tennis, swimming, fitness and social facilities of The Club. Tennis Members will have a 3 day sign up privilege to reserve tennis court times and will not be charged fees. There will be restricted use of the golf facilities at The Club, Tennis Members will have a one day sign up privilege to reserve golf starting times and will be allowed to play one time per month from November 1st to April 30th and two times per month from May 1st to October 31st. Tennis Members will be requires to pay green fees and golf cart fees ($80 green fee + $32 cart fee).
Social Membership
A Social Member is entitled to use all of the swimming, fitness and social facilities of The Club. There will be restricted use of golf and tennis facilities at The Club. Social Members will have a one day sign up privilege to reserve golf starting times and tennis court reservations. A Social Member’s use of the golf and tennis facilities will be restricted to one time per month during the period from November 1st to April 30th and two times per month during the period from May 1st through October 31st. Social Members will be required to pay green fees and golf cart fees for use of the golf facilities ($80 green fee + $32 cart fee), as well as court fees for use of the tennis facilities ($15 court fee).
Marina Membership
With over five miles of secluded waterway, our residents have the opportunity to enjoy the benefits of yachting in the pristine blue waters of Jupiter, Florida. The Marina features over 500 private docks, 63 marina slips accommodating yachts up to 130 ft, a floating fuel dock, pump-out facilities and a marina Ship Store, stocking the latest in marine equipment, marine gear, food and wine. Admiral’s Cove has everything a boating enthusiast might need right at their fingertips.
Live Your Best Life at Admirals Cove
